1628750.name: Evaverse
1628750.description:
WELCOME TO THE EVAVERSE


EVAVERSE is a social immersion platform for friends and competitive gamers to play and compete in an immersive digital world. Evaverse is an ever-evolving gaming that our community and players can shape. Future game modes, maps, and playstyles are being constantly shaped by our discord community and continually over time.

Evaverse is comprised of a series of game modes. Each mode will offer a unique leaderboard and reward structure for players to compete in. More game modes are being actively developed and worked on with our community. Each mode is free-to-play for all players!

Join the Battlebound Discord for free in-game rewards! -

EVAVERSE Game Modes

Hoverboarding
Hoverboard racing allows players to zip around the Evaverse moon bases competing for the fastest times. Hoverboards gain experience, levels, and speed the more you race! Chart your fastest times through each level but watch out for dangerous obstacles and puzzles on the track!

Cosmic Cup
Cosmic Cup is a pet racing battle game mode that lets players compete in the Evaverse Arena as their loyal companion avatars called Turtle Troops! Battle it out for the best race time and win unique Evaverse rewards.

Arena Shooter
Grab your hoverboard and equip your favorite weapon to fight for dominance in the upcoming Arena Shooter mode. Players will zip through the Evaverse world with a uniquely crafted weapon that puts your aim, positioning, and battle instincts to the test. This mode is set to release in Q1 2023.

EVAVERSE Social Play
There's a variety of lightweight social games within the Evaverse that players can access via the Mini-Game menu.

  • Treasure Hunting- Mount your hoverboard and scour the world for hidden treasure
  • Stepping Stones- Summon a stepping stone to traverse the map any way you like
  • Railgun - Shoot players and stun them from across the map
  • Low Gravity - Climb the tallest peaks by modifying your gravity settings
  • Bowling - Set up some pins to knockdown
  • Soccer - Create a ball to kick around
  • Tag - Keep away from the person who is it

The EVAVERSE game will continue to grow and expand in future releases and will always be free-to-play!
